thread.title: BRIEF-Leaf Group Announces Proposed Public Offering Of Common Stock

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Leaf Group Announces Proposed Public Offering Of Common Stock

organizations.name: brief-leaf group announces proposed public offering of common stock leaf group ltd

text:
Leaf Group Ltd:
* LEAF GROUP ANNOUNCES PROPOSED PUBLIC OFFERING OF COMMON STOCK
* LEAF GROUP LTD - ‍INTENDS TO OFFER AND SELL APPROXIMATELY $22 MILLION OF SHARES OF ITS COMMON STOCK IN AN UNDERWRITTEN REGISTERED PUBLIC OFFERING​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
